metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29968 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.17.5. io_rw_init_filein fs/io_uring.c lacks initialization of kiocb->private.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
